model.unit

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.unit.Unit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    public class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
    Defines an object composed of various model.unit objects.
    Author:
    Jonathan Trudeau
